item.title: Blockchain Network Analysis: A Comparative Studies of Decentralized Banks
item.description: Use social network analysis to investigate the decentralization of popular DeFi protocols.

item.title: Visualizing NFT Ethics: A Case Study on CryptoPunks
item.description: Investigate CryptoPunks, the most famous collection in the NFT market, to explore and visualize its potential ethical issues.
